full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I NYAMS LEN DANG SBYAR BA'I GSOL 'DEBS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I NYAMS LEN DANG, SBYAR BA'I GSOL 'DEBS TSIGS SU BCAD PA YI, TSUL 'DI NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS MING CAN BDAG ,NA TSOD CHES PA SPYANGS THOB SKYES THOB KYI, BLO GROS DMAN PAS BSTAN BCOS RTZOM PA YIS, ,SPOBS PA MED KYANG RANG BLO SPEL PHYIR DU, ,BGYIS PA NONGS PAR GYUR BA GANG YIN PA, MKHAS PA'I TSOGS LA SNYING NAS BDAG CHAGS SO, ,'DIS MTSON DGE RNAMS TSE RAB THAMS CAD DU, ,'JAM MGON BLA MA'I BSTAN PA 'DZIN PA DANG, SPEL NAS RGYAL BSTAN BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL, ,NAM YANG MI NUB GNAS PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR GNANG BA YIN,, ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
